entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts and a powerful wizard. He is described as continuing to look up at Fudge, indicating his importance and authority.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is the Minister of Magic and appears to be flustered and disconcerted. He is trying to communicate with Dumbledore but seems uncertain.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Weasley is a member of the Weasley family and is summoned by Fudge to bring another chair. His name is mentioned as a way to address him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts and is present in the scene. Dumbledore uses his wand to conjure a chair for Harry.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is looking at Fudge, indicating that he is paying attention to him.
Fudge asks Weasley for help in bringing another chair, but Dumbledore uses his wand to conjure one instead.
Fudge is trying to communicate with Dumbledore about the hearing and its changed time and place.
